Package renderer

Class RenderThread.RenderBuilder

java.lang.Object
renderer.Render.RenderBuilder
Enclosing class:
RenderThread
public static class RenderThread.RenderBuilder
extends java.lang.Object
Builder Pattern, by this class we are updating the parent class (Render), instance that we are interested in creating even before we create it

    • setMultithreading

      public RenderThread.RenderBuilder setMultithreading​(int threads)
      Chaining method for setting number of threads. If set to 1, the render won't use the thread pool. If set to greater than 1, the render will use the thread pool with the given threads. If set to 0, the thread pool will pick the number of threads.
      Parameters:
      threads - number of threads to use
      Returns:
      the current render
      Throws:
      java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - when threads is less than 0

    • setPrintPercent

      public RenderThread.RenderBuilder setPrintPercent​(boolean print)
      Chaining method for making the render to print the progress of the rendering in percents.
      Parameters:
      print - if true, prints the percents
      Returns:
      the current render

    • getNextPixel

      private RenderThread.Pixel getNextPixel()
      Returns the next pixel to draw on multithreaded rendering. If finished to draw all pixels, returns null.

    • renderImageMultithreaded

      private boolean renderImageMultithreaded​(RenderThread.Pixel p)
      Renders a given pixel on multithreaded rendering. If the given pixel is null, returns false which means kill the thread.
      Parameters:
      p - the pixel to render

    • castRay

      private void castRay​(int nX, int nY, int col, int row)
      todo - antialysing Casts a ray through a given pixel and writes the color to the image.
      Parameters:
      nX - the number of columns in the picture
      nY - the number of rows in the picture
      col - the column of the current pixel
      row - the row of the current pixel

    • build

      public RenderThread build()
      We call this function when we have finished giving values to all the fields of the class, and we are interested in creating an entity
      Returns:
      Render
